title: Phillips 66 CEO: Chemicals at Bottom of 'Very Tough Cycle'
description: Mark Lashier, Phillips 66 CEO, says the chemicals business is at the bottom of a tough cycle and remains bullish on its long-term fundamentals. He tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on The Close the business will eventually turn. (Source: Bloomberg)
